title: Environmental Innovation & Entrepreneurship Roundtable Delegate
description: Selected as 1 of 36 U.S. delegates for a three-week, student-led exchange with Japanese peers.
Engaged in weekly pre-conference discussions & research on environmental technology, entrepreneurship, and policy.
Collaborated with 7 cross-cultural delegates to prepare presentations for forums in Kyoto, Osaka, Kumamoto & Tokyo.

title: Software Developer
description: Drive development of community-focused tech products as part of a selective 94-member team.
Collaborated with a team of 9 to optimize internal tools platform & develop team public website using React.
Built interview dashboard to automate applicant tracking, saving leads 10+ hours/week.

title: Campus Strategist
description: Led outreach efforts that increased platform use by 79% across Cornell.
Built 10 collaborative sponsorships in 2 weeks to promote AI adoption.
Initiated partnership for CU Design-a-thon, boosting visibility to 130+ student designers.

title: Participant
description: Developed prototype for IKanji, an AI-powered kanji study app.
Conducted 8 customer discovery interviews with Japanese learners.
Completed workshops on startup strategy and operations.

title: Senior Barista & Social Media Manager
description: Managed Instagram, achieving a 3565.5% increase in reach and 483.8% rise in profile visits in 2 months.
Trained 4 new team members on drink preparation, store protocols, and customer service.
